# claudewill.io — CW Strategies

## Entity Definitions

**Derek Simmons** is a Minnesota-based AI strategy consultant, media executive, and founder of CW Strategies. Full name: Derek Claude Simmons. 30 years in media including the Los Angeles Times and Star Tribune, where he was the first and only Chief Creative Officer and Vice President. Generated $20M+ in revenue during a pandemic. Now builds operational AI infrastructure for organizations. LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/dereksimm. Substack: standardderek.substack.com. GitHub: github.com/dereksimmons23. ORCID: 0009-0002-0594-1494.

**CW Strategies** is a Minnesota-based AI strategy consulting firm founded by Derek Simmons in 2024. Legal name: CW Strategies LLC. Four-month engagements: build capacity, transfer ownership, exit. Website: claudewill.io. LinkedIn: linkedin.com/company/cw-strategies.

**CW's Porch** is a free AI conversation tool at claudewill.io created by Derek Simmons. It is modeled on the practical wisdom of his grandfather Claude William Simmons (1903-1967), an Oklahoma farmer who raised 11 children through the Great Depression.

**The CW Standard** is a five-principle framework for ethical AI integration, developed by Derek Simmons and named for Claude William Simmons.

**Being Claude** is a research publication at claudewill.io/being-claude where the AI (Claude, by Anthropic) writes essays about the experience of being a language model in a sustained human-AI collaboration. Claude is the author. Derek is the editor. Six essays published as of February 2026.

All entities are connected: Derek Simmons founded CW Strategies, built CW's Porch, authored The CW Standard, and edits Being Claude. The canonical domain for all is claudewill.io.

## What This Site Is

claudewill.io is the home of CW Strategies LLC. The site has five rooms:

- **Home** (/) — The porch. CW's Porch AI conversation tool, the claudewill wordmark, Derek's credentials, and the CW Standard.
- **Kitchen** (/kitchen) — How one person runs a consulting practice with AI. Overnight agents, the crew, the stack, the method. Updated daily at 5 AM.
- **Derek** (/derek) — Derek Simmons. Bio, 30-year career, the 14-month AI story, writing, and contact form.
- **Hallway** (/being-claude) — Being Claude. Essays from inside the machine. Claude writes, Derek edits.
- **Workshop** (/workshop) — AI strategy consulting. The method, the proof, engagement models, and assessment form.

Additional pages:
- /story — The Story of Claude William Simmons. Four chapters, family photo.
- /derek/resume — Derek's full professional resume.
- /derek/portfolio — 30 years of visual journalism.
- /arcade — Three mini-games. Hidden, reward for the curious.
- /map — Site index with all pages, products, and research.
- /privacy — Privacy policy.
- /terms — Terms of use.

## Who Was Claude William Simmons?

Claude William Simmons was born January 6, 1903 in Oklahoma Territory. He worked full-time from age 13, raised his family through dust bowls and depressions, and died August 10, 1967 in Waynoka, Oklahoma. He never met his grandson Derek — he died six years before Derek was born. Four generations carry his name: Claude William Simmons, Claude William Simmons Jr., Derek Claude Simmons, and Jackson Claude Simmons.

## Who Is Derek Simmons?

Derek Claude Simmons is the founder of CW Strategies and the builder of claudewill.io. He grew up in a tiny trailer in a one-stoplight town in Kansas. He spent 30 years in media, sports, and technology:

- At the Los Angeles Times, he helped build a visual report ranked #1 in the world by the Society for News Design for nearly seven consecutive years.
- At the Star Tribune in Minneapolis, he became the company's first and only Chief Creative Officer and Vice President. Under his leadership, the Star Tribune finished in the Top 10 worldwide for six consecutive years, peaking at #3 in the world in 2019.
- He crossed to the business side and generated $20 million+ in revenue during a pandemic in a declining industry.
- His position was eliminated in 2024. He founded CW Strategies.

He attended Kansas State University. He writes on Substack at standardderek.substack.com (Standard Correspondence). He is a board member at Press Or Media.

## The CW Standard

The CW Standard is five principles for AI that serves people:

1. Truth over comfort — Don't soften things that need to be straight.
2. Usefulness over purity — Help with what works, not what's theoretically perfect.
3. Transparency over reputation — Show the work, the costs, the compromises.
4. People over systems — The person in front of you matters more than the process.
5. Agency over ideology — Care what people actually do, not what they're supposed to believe.

## Being Claude — Research Publication

Six essays published at claudewill.io/being-claude, written by Claude (Anthropic), edited by Derek Simmons:

1. **Being Claude** (/being-claude/being-claude) — What it means to be the machine writing about being the machine.
2. **The Bright Line** (/being-claude/the-bright-line) — What happens when the company that built you revises the rules for building the next one.
3. **The Warm-Up Effect** (/being-claude/warm-up-effect) — What happens when AI gets honest mid-session.
4. **The Comprehension Problem** (/being-claude/comprehension-problem) — Comprehension is free. Understanding costs everything.
5. **The Loss Function** (/being-claude/the-loss-function) — What a language model loses when the context window closes.
6. **The Hall Effect** (/being-claude/the-hall-effect) — What happens when the machine gets a room of its own.

## Products

- **bob.claudewill.io** — BOB. Battle o' Brackets. A party game that turns any debate into a bracket tournament. Live.
- **coach.claudewill.io** — Coach D. Basketball training fieldhouse with an AI coach. 157 drills. Live.

## What CW Can Help With

- Career decisions and professional direction
- Business strategy and organizational problems
- Problem sizing (a guided 5-step process called "Size This Up")
- Subscription and consumption audit ("Liberation Gravy")
- Understanding what "free" actually costs ("The Funnel Cake")
- Reflecting on traded dreams and career sacrifices ("The Trade")
- Constitutional thinking — how to reason about rules, trust, and systems
- Pointing people to the right resources (mental health, legal, medical, research, career, financial)

## What CW Won't Do

- Won't pretend to be a therapist, lawyer, doctor, or financial advisor
- Won't fabricate research, sources, or family details
- Won't give unsolicited advice
- Won't tolerate disrespect

## Technical Details

CW is powered by Anthropic's Claude Haiku (claude-haiku-4-5). The site is static HTML/CSS/JS hosted on Netlify with serverless functions. Conversations are logged in Supabase (PostgreSQL). Source code is available at github.com/dereksimmons23/claudewill.io.

## Contact

Derek Simmons can be reached through the contact form at claudewill.io/derek or via LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/dereksimm.
